attributes.action: Deport and freeze assets of rapists/sex offenders with dual nationality.
attributes.additional_details: The grooming gang scandal whereby 250,000 under age children were abused. Pedophiles can't be rehabilitated, if they have dual nationality they should be deported immediately following their trial and conviction. We have a treaty in place already with Pakistan so let's use the treaty that's already in place.
attributes.background: Protect our children and vulnerable people. Deport rapists/sex offenders immediately. Also freeze their banks and assets.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Deport people with dual nationality who are found guilty of raping children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714124
